action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Breath Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The ancestral has a magical breath weapon that does damage based on its summoner's draconian origin.
The ancestral ally breath weapon's damage is based on the resistance the dragon shaman gained from their Draconic Origins.

The ancestral ally exhales a breath weapon in a 15 ft cone. Each creature in the cone makes {@dc 15} dexterity saving throw or takes {@damage 2d6} damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

resist.special: shares any resistances it its summoner had

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The ancestral ally doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The ancestral ally can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Limited Flight
entries: The ancestral ally cannot fully fly, instead it can ascend up to 40 ft into the air, but slowly descends downward and by the end of its turn remains hovering 1 foot off the ground. It can indefinitely hover 1 foot off the ground and can move horizontally through the air normally, but if it has 0 speed while more than 5 ft off the ground, it slowly descends downward at a rate of 60 ft per round.
